original_text: When he hesitated, the men grasped his hand and the hands of his wife and of his two daughters and led them safely out of the city, for the Lord was merciful to them.
korean_text: 그러나 롯이 지체하매 그 사람들이 롯의 손과 그 아내의 손과 두 딸의 손을 잡아 인도하여 성 밖에 두니 여호와께서 그에게 자비를 더하심이었더라

sentences.original_text: and the hands of his wife
and led them safely out of the city
for the Lord was merciful to them
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 주께서 그들에게 자비를 베푸셨기 때문이다
